REUTERS.UNKNOWN: C M f0404 reute u f BC-JOHNSON-MATTHEY'S-PLA 04-09 0061

TEXT.TITLE: JOHNSON MATTHEY'S PLATINUM GROUP PRICES
TEXT.BODY: Johnson Matthey today issued the following Platinum group base prices (unfabricated), all U.S. Dlrs per troy ounce. Previous prices in parentheses. PLATINUM - 562 (567) PALLADIUM - 130 (130) IRIDIUM - 400 (400) RHODIUM 1,230 (1,230) RUTHENIUM - 80 (80)
